mapper.insert: INSERT INTO electronic_approval(E_TYPE, E_DRAFTDATE, E_STARTDAY, E_ENDDAY, E_CON, E_TEXTTITLE, E_TEXTCONTENT, E_STATUS, TIDX) VALUES (#{e_type}, #{e_draftDate}, #{e_startDay}, #{e_endDay}, #{e_con}, #{e_textTitle}, #{e_textContent}, #{e_status}, #{tidx})
mapper.update: update ELECTRONIC_APPROVAL set DELYN = 'Y' where eidx = #{eidx}

update ELECTRONIC_APPROVAL set E_TYPE = #{e_type}, E_DRAFTDATE = #{e_draftDate}, E_STARTDAY = #{e_startDay}, E_ENDDAY = #{e_endDay}, E_CON = #{e_con}, E_TEXTTITLE = #{e_textTitle}, E_TEXTCONTENT = #{e_textContent} where eidx = #{eidx}

update ELECTRONIC_APPROVAL set E_TYPE = #{e_type}, E_DRAFTDATE = #{e_draftDate}, E_STARTDAY = #{e_startDay}, E_ENDDAY = #{e_endDay}, E_CON = #{e_con},E_TEXTTITLE = #{e_textTitle}, E_TEXTCONTENT = #{e_textContent}, E_STATUS = '결재대기', E_APPROVALNOYN = 'N' , E_APPROVALNOPERSON = '' , E_REASON = '' where eidx = #{eidx}
update ELECTRONIC_APPROVAL set E_STATUS = '결재진행' where eidx = #{eidx}
update ELECTRONIC_APPROVAL set E_STATUS = '결재완료' where eidx = #{eidx}
update ELECTRONIC_APPROVAL set E_STATUS = '결재반려', E_APPROVALNOYN = 'Y' , E_APPROVALNOPERSON = #{e_approvalNoPerson}, E_REASON = #{e_reason} where eidx = #{eidx}
mapper.select: select count(eidx) from ELECTRONIC_APPROVAL where eidx > 0 and delyn = 'N' and e_status = '결재대기'
select count(eidx) from ELECTRONIC_APPROVAL where eidx > 0 and delyn = 'N' and e_status = '결재진행'
select count(eidx) from ELECTRONIC_APPROVAL where eidx > 0 and delyn = 'N' and e_status = '결재완료'
select count(eidx) from ELECTRONIC_APPROVAL where eidx > 0 and delyn = 'N' and e_status = '결재반려'

select count(eidx) as cnt from ( select A.*,B.T_NAME, B.T_ID, B.T_DEPARTMENT, B.T_POSITION, C.TEAMLEADER, C.SECTIONHEAD, C.DEPARTMENTHEAD, C.LEADER, C.STATUS FROM ELECTRONIC_APPROVAL A left join AFPS_MEMBER B ON A.TIDX = B.TIDX LEFT JOIN APPROVAL_LINE C on A.EIDX = C.EIDX where 1=1 )a where eidx > 0 and delyn = 'N'

select EIDX, E_TYPE, E_DRAFTDATE, E_STARTDAY, E_ENDDAY, E_CON, E_TEXTTITLE, E_TEXTCONTENT, E_STATUS, E_APPROVALNOYN, E_APPROVALNOPERSON, E_REASON, TIDX, T_NAME, T_ID, T_DEPARTMENT, T_POSITION, TEAMLEADER, SECTIONHEAD, DEPARTMENTHEAD, LEADER, STATUS, DELYN from ( select A.*, B.T_NAME, B.T_ID, B.T_DEPARTMENT, B.T_POSITION, C.TEAMLEADER, C.SECTIONHEAD, C.DEPARTMENTHEAD, C.LEADER, C.STATUS,(SELECT @ROWNUM := 1) R FROM ELECTRONIC_APPROVAL A left join AFPS_MEMBER B ON A.TIDX = B.TIDX LEFT JOIN APPROVAL_LINE C on A.EIDX = C.EIDX WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY A.EIDX desc)a WHERE delyn ='N' and EIDX LIMIT #{pageStart},#{perPageNum}

if.if: AND (E_TEXTTITLE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')) or (E_TEXTCONTENT LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%'))

choose.when: AND ((TEAMLEADER = #{userId} and STATUS = '3000') or (SECTIONHEAD = #{userId} and STATUS = '0300') or (DEPARTMENTHEAD = #{userId} and STATUS = '0030') or (LEADER = #{userId} and STATUS = '0003')) and A.DELYN = 'N'

otherwise.if: AND ((TEAMLEADER = #{userId} and STATUS = '3000') or (SECTIONHEAD = #{userId} and STATUS = '0300') or (DEPARTMENTHEAD = #{userId} and STATUS = '0030') or (LEADER = #{userId} and STATUS = '0003')) and A.DELYN = 'N'
